name: 系统服务状态基线
description: 关键系统服务状态检查（参考 CIS Benchmark 和等保 2.0）

rules.title: SSH 服务应运行
rules.description: SSH 服务应处于运行状态

fix.suggestion: 启动 SSH 服务：systemctl start sshd && systemctl enable sshd
fix.command: systemctl start sshd && systemctl enable sshd

rules.title: 时间同步服务应运行
rules.description: 时间同步服务（chronyd 或 ntpd）应处于运行状态

fix.suggestion: 启动时间同步服务：systemctl start chronyd && systemctl enable chronyd
fix.command: systemctl start chronyd && systemctl enable chronyd

rules.title: 禁用 telnet 服务
rules.description: telnet 服务应被禁用，使用 SSH 替代

fix.suggestion: 禁用 telnet 服务：systemctl stop telnet.socket && systemctl disable telnet.socket
fix.command: systemctl stop telnet.socket 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable telnet.socket 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 rsh 服务
rules.description: rsh 服务应被禁用，存在安全风险

fix.suggestion: 禁用 rsh 服务：systemctl stop rsh.socket && systemctl disable rsh.socket
fix.command: systemctl stop rsh.socket 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable rsh.socket 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 rlogin 服务
rules.description: rlogin 服务应被禁用，存在安全风险

fix.suggestion: 禁用 rlogin 服务：systemctl stop rlogin.socket && systemctl disable rlogin.socket
fix.command: systemctl stop rlogin.socket 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable rlogin.socket 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 rexec 服务
rules.description: rexec 服务应被禁用，存在安全风险

fix.suggestion: 禁用 rexec 服务：systemctl stop rexec.socket && systemctl disable rexec.socket
fix.command: systemctl stop rexec.socket 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable rexec.socket 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 FTP 服务
rules.description: FTP 服务应被禁用（除非业务需要），使用 SFTP 替代

fix.suggestion: 禁用 FTP 服务：systemctl stop vsftpd && systemctl disable vsftpd
fix.command: systemctl stop vsftpd 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable vsftpd 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 NFS 服务（客户端不需要时）
rules.description: NFS 服务应被禁用（除非作为 NFS 服务器）

fix.suggestion: 禁用 NFS 服务：systemctl stop nfs-server && systemctl disable nfs-server
fix.command: systemctl stop nfs-server 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable nfs-server 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 avahi-daemon 服务
rules.description: avahi-daemon（mDNS）应被禁用（除非需要 Bonjour 发现）

fix.suggestion: 禁用 avahi-daemon：systemctl stop avahi-daemon && systemctl disable avahi-daemon
fix.command: systemctl stop avahi-daemon 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable avahi-daemon 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 cups 服务（非打印服务器）
rules.description: cups 打印服务应被禁用（除非需要打印功能）

fix.suggestion: 禁用 cups 服务：systemctl stop cups && systemctl disable cups
fix.command: systemctl stop cups 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable cups 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 dhcpd 服务（非 DHCP 服务器）
rules.description: DHCP 服务应被禁用（除非作为 DHCP 服务器）

fix.suggestion: 禁用 dhcpd 服务：systemctl stop dhcpd && systemctl disable dhcpd
fix.command: systemctl stop dhcpd 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable dhcpd 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 named 服务（非 DNS 服务器）
rules.description: DNS 服务应被禁用（除非作为 DNS 服务器）

fix.suggestion: 禁用 named 服务：systemctl stop named && systemctl disable named
fix.command: systemctl stop named 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable named 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 xrdp 服务
rules.description: xrdp 远程桌面服务应被禁用（除非需要远程桌面）

fix.suggestion: 禁用 xrdp 服务：systemctl stop xrdp && systemctl disable xrdp
fix.command: systemctl stop xrdp 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable xrdp 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 snmpd 服务（非 SNMP 管理）
rules.description: SNMP 服务应被禁用（除非需要 SNMP 监控）

fix.suggestion: 禁用 snmpd 服务：systemctl stop snmpd && systemctl disable snmpd
fix.command: systemctl stop snmpd 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable snmpd 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 tftp 服务
rules.description: TFTP 服务应被禁用，存在安全风险

fix.suggestion: 禁用 TFTP 服务：systemctl stop tftp.socket && systemctl disable tftp.socket
fix.command: systemctl stop tftp.socket 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable tftp.socket 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 禁用 xinetd 服务
rules.description: xinetd 服务应被禁用（除非特别需要）

fix.suggestion: 禁用 xinetd 服务：systemctl stop xinetd && systemctl disable xinetd
fix.command: systemctl stop xinetd 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable xinetd 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: 防火墙服务应运行
rules.description: 防火墙服务（firewalld 或 iptables）应处于运行状态

fix.suggestion: 启动防火墙服务：systemctl start firewalld && systemctl enable firewalld
fix.command: systemctl start firewalld && systemctl enable firewalld

rules.title: SELinux 或 AppArmor 应启用
rules.description: 应启用 SELinux（CentOS/RHEL）或 AppArmor（Ubuntu/Debian）

param: if command -v getenforce >/dev/null 2>&1; then getenforce; else echo 'getenforce_not_found'; fi
if [ -f /sys/kernel/security/apparmor/profiles ]; then cat /sys/kernel/security/apparmor/profiles 2>/dev/null | wc -l; else echo 0; fi

fix.suggestion: SELinux: setenforce 1 并修改 /etc/selinux/config；AppArmor: systemctl enable --now apparmor

rules.title: auditd 审计服务应运行
rules.description: auditd 审计服务应处于运行状态

fix.suggestion: 启动 auditd 服务：systemctl start auditd && systemctl enable auditd
fix.command: systemctl start auditd && systemctl enable auditd

rules.title: rsyslog 日志服务应运行
rules.description: rsyslog 日志服务应处于运行状态

fix.suggestion: 启动 rsyslog 服务：systemctl start rsyslog && systemctl enable rsyslog
fix.command: systemctl start rsyslog && systemctl enable rsyslog

rules.title: 禁用 rpcbind 服务
rules.description: rpcbind 服务应被禁用（除非使用 NFS）

fix.suggestion: 禁用 rpcbind 服务：systemctl stop rpcbind && systemctl disable rpcbind
fix.command: systemctl stop rpcbind 2>/dev/null; systemctl disable rpcbind 2>/dev/null; systemctl mask rpcbind 2>/dev/null; true

rules.title: postfix 仅本地监听
rules.description: postfix 邮件服务应仅监听本地接口

fix.suggestion: 配置 postfix 仅监听本地：在 /etc/postfix/main.cf 中设置 inet_interfaces = localhost
fix.command: postconf -e 'inet_interfaces = localhost' && systemctl restart postfix

rules.title: X Window 系统未安装
rules.description: 服务器应不安装 X Window 系统，减少攻击面

param: rpm -q xorg-x11-server-Xorg 2>/dev/null || dpkg -l xorg 2>/dev/null || echo not_installed

fix.suggestion: 卸载 X Window 系统
fix.command: yum remove xorg-x11-server-Xorg -y 2>/dev/null || apt remove xorg -y 2>/dev/null || true

rules.title: 时间同步服务开机自启
rules.description: 时间同步服务应配置为开机自启动

fix.suggestion: 启用时间同步服务开机自启
fix.command: systemctl enable chronyd 2>/dev/null || systemctl enable ntpd 2>/dev/null || systemctl enable systemd-timesyncd 2>/dev/null

rules.title: 时间同步源已配置
rules.description: 应配置可靠的时间同步源（NTP 服务器）

fix.suggestion: 配置 NTP 服务器，编辑 /etc/chrony.conf 添加 server 或 pool 配置
